description: This file declares the MTA_Agent class which implements a set of RPC methods for a management agent, including initialization, termination, parameter handling, and health checks. It also includes necessary headers and defines interface functions for the agent.

classes.name: MTA_Agent
classes.description: A class implementing RPC methods for a management agent, inheriting from RDKTestStubInterface and AbstractServer to handle agent operations and remote procedure calls.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the agent with a version string.

methods.name: cleanup
methods.description: Cleans up resources for the agent with a version string.

methods.name: testmodulepre_requisites
methods.description: Checks prerequisites before running the test module.

methods.name: testmodulepost_requisites
methods.description: Checks post-conditions after running the test module.

methods.name: MTA_agent_Init
methods.description: Handles the initialization request for the agent.

methods.name: MTA_agent_Terminate
methods.description: Handles the termination request for the agent.

methods.name: MTA_agent_GetParameterNames
methods.description: Fetches parameter names for the agent.

methods.name: MTA_agent_SetParameterValues
methods.description: Sets parameter values in the agent.

methods.name: MTA_agent_GetParameterValues
methods.description: Retrieves parameter values from the agent.

methods.name: MTA_agent_GetParameterNames_NextLevel
methods.description: Fetches parameter names at the next hierarchy level.

methods.name: MTA_agent_AddTbl
methods.description: Adds a new table or configuration.

methods.name: MTA_agent_SetSessionId
methods.description: Sets session ID and priority details.

methods.name: MTA_agent_GetHealth
methods.description: Performs a health check or status retrieval.
